p: For anti-DENV IgG antibodies, of the 200 serum samples, 31 (15.5%) were classified as positive and 169 (84.5%) as negative, in the ELISA test. Of the 31 positive samples, 4 (12.9%) were negative in the IIF test; of these 4 discordant samples, only 1 (25%) had undetectable DENV in the PCR. However, of the 169 negative samples, 14 (8%) were positive in the IIF test; of these 14 discordant samples, 9 (64%) were also positive in the PCR ( Table 2).
